description:
Agility is the key benefit of these trekking or light alpine boots. The waterproof membrane keeps your feet dry on bushy and damp approaches and the custom fit is a boon for fast-moving ridgeline scrambles. They're more breathable than a 4-season alpine boot, but are compatible with crampons, so you can boot across a pocket glacier or quickly ascend a deep moat or 'shrund.

  • L-Tech nylon and water-resistant Microtech upper
  • Padded collar for maximum comfort
  • HDry® waterproof membrane seals out moisture
  • Flex-point upper design for natural walking motion
  • Self-moulding ankle padding for a custom fit
  • Pro-Fiber XT 20 insole insulates and supports
  • Multi-density PU and EVA midsole provides shock absorption and maintains sensitivity
  • Outsoles are Vibram® Pentax Precision XT rubber for grip in variable terrain
name: Scarpa Charmoz Mountaineering Boots - Men's
